users.serializer module

class users.serializer.UserRegisterSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: ModelSerializer

Serializer for registering a new user. Handles user creation with password hashing and email validation.

class Meta[source]

Bases: object

arguments: validated_data – validated data from the serializer returns: instance of the created user

validate_email(value)[source]
